fields.label: Project
fields.labelNote: GCP Project ID where your BigQuery database is located

fields.label: Location
fields.labelNote: GCP region for your BigQuery datasets

fields.label: Staging GCS Storage Bucket Name
fields.labelNote: GCS Bucket to storage data before loading into BigQuery
fields.footerNote: Please make sure the bucket exists in your GCP Project in the same region as bigquery dataset

fields.label: Namespace
fields.labelNote: Schema name for the warehouse where the tables are created
fields.footerNote: Default will be the source name

fields.label: Credentials
fields.labelNote: GCP Service Account credentials JSON for RudderStack to use in loading data into your BigQuery database
fields.footerNote: Create a service account in your GCP Project for RudderStack with roles of 'BigQuery User'

fields.label: Sync Starting At (Optional)
fields.footerNote: Note: Please specify time in UTC
